explains: n. 新闻工作者，新闻记者；报人，报纸撰稿人

sentences.en: He daydreams of being a famous journalist.
sentences.cn: 他梦想成为一个有名的记者。

sentences.en: My job as a journalist is to expose the truth.
sentences.cn: 我作为记者的职责就是展示事实。

sentences.en: She earns her living as a freelance journalist.
sentences.cn: 她靠做自由撰稿记者来维持生计。
